summary: The module provides helper loss functions and an integration test class that sets up synthetic 2D image data, constructs an autoencoder generator and a discriminator, configures an AdversarialTrainer with reconstruction, generator, and discriminator losses, attaches checkpoint and statistics handlers, runs a brief training session, and verifies successful execution and artifact creation.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the end‑to‑end adversarial training pipeline in the MONAI library for medical imaging, ensuring that model components, loss calculations, training loops, and logging mechanisms work together reliably in production or research environments.
